attributes.action: Revoke the recent ban of dogs going into public 'Green Areas' in the Isle of Man. This ban is causing considerable suffering for many elderly/disabled dog-owners.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Council on the Isle of Man have recently banned dogs from all 'Public Green Areas' in its capital Douglas and elsewhere. This ban is causing many dogs to be re-homed as owners now have nowhere to walk their dogs. This includes many elderly and disabled people that have owned their dogs for many years and their daily routines and social lives depend on their animals.  This ban is causing considerable suffering for many elderly/disabled dog-owners. We have brought this matter to the attention of yourselves following repeated protests, petitions and talks with our local Government all being quite futile.

rejection.details: This is a matter for your local authority
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
